item.description:
Please RSVP! Bring a pen or pencil!

Title: Highlighting Stockpicks

Description:
We will focus on Stock Picks in this meeting. Each person attending is urged to bring a stock pick - a stock they recommend. Also, we have just finished the September to May season for our group and it is time to evaluate what people liked.

During the Market Discussion Doug will review the Mandelbrot book "Misbehavior of Markets" that Stephen Cucchiaro talked about during his presentation. He will explain how Mandelbrot sets and discrete dynamics affect his market analysis.


The agenda for the meetup will be:
6:00 - 7:00 Bob Podd leads a session of Tom OBrien trading methodologies (this is the
Tom OBrien of the Financial News Network www.tfnn.com). The topics include:
- Fibonacci retracements and expansions
- Individual stock and market trends by benchmarking volume
- Target prices and proper entry points
- other topics included in the book Timing the Trade

6:30 - 7:00 Socializing and Brad will take pictures for BostonIBD profiles
7:00 - 7:30 Fred Sears's Q&A
7:30 - 8:00 Market Discussion and Group Evaluation led by Doug
8:00 Stockpicks led by Mike Kinkead and Chris Jones

To join our online discussion go to
http://groups.google....
or send email to DouglasWRoberts@gmail.com.

This is a free and open meeting. No membership is required.
item.name: The Boston Investor's Business Daily June Meetup
